title: Lowes | SSE | Bangalore vs AngelOne | SDE2 | Remote
content:
Education: B.Tech 
Years of Experience: 6 yrs
Prior Experience: Bayer ( SDE 2 )
Current Compensation - 22L + 2.2L bonus = 24.2L
Company: Lowes
Title/Level: SSE
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 29L Base
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 2L
Stock bonus: 0L
Bonus: 2.9L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 29L + 2L + 2.9L = 33.9L
Benefits: Hybrid working model ( 2 days from office )
Other details: includes cab and food related benefits separately.


I have a competing offer from AngelOne for an SDE2 role with a fixed compensation of 34L and 3.4L bonus. TC comes to around 38.3L and no joining bonus. 
AngelOne is offering SDE2 role and has remote working culture. 

I am a bit confused between the 2 considering the difference in role and compensation that is being offered. Can someone pls share their views on this taking  WLB and job security and on the job learning experience into the picture. 
Also wanted to understand are both the offers a low-ball?
